charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(C) and 18:2 - Possession with Intent to Distribute Methamphetamine, a Controlled Substance and Aid &; Abet(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is placed on Probation for a term of THREE (3) YEARS. Special Assessment: $100. *PROBATION REVOKED ON 4/13/15. Defendant is committed to BOP for a term of FIVE (5) MONTHS, plus one hundred thirty-two days of official detention adjustment, followed by a term of THIRTY-SIX (36) MONTHS of Supervised Release. *SUPERVISED RELEASE REVOKED ON 6/1/16. Defendant is committed to the custody of BOP for a term of EIGHT (8) MONTHS, followed by Supervised Release for THIRTY-SIX (36) MONTHS.
